DOC.brief_summary: This is a 16-day study to evaluate the safety and efficacy of ketorolac eye drops for the treatment of inflammation and pain associated with cataract surgery.
DOC.brief_title: A Study of Ketorolac for the Treatment of Inflammation and Pain Associated With Cataract Surgery
DOC.criteria: Patients undergoing cataract surgery Uncontrolled ocular disease in cataract surgery eye
